name: Army Civil War: FPS Gun Shoote
name_original: Army Civil War: FPS Gun Shoote
description:
Army Civil War: FPS Gun Shooter is best game of army counter shooter combat on army border to save country from new counter terrorist attack: team fighting . Start battle to join this swat team or counter terrorist force to military crackdown evil enemies in civil war games. Start military squad to win counter terrorist game which are specially designed for lovers of counter terror games with army attack on this best strategy game of army soldier fight going through army fighting games.
Key features:
- use of hand grenades
- won the strike fight with best strategy
- multiple war missions
- thrilling action packed war
